subject: Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: New York’s top court rejected the Kentucky Derby-winning thoroughbred trainer Rick Dutrow Jr.’s appeal to overturn his 10-year ban by state regulators because of what he claimed were substantial civil rights issues.
snippet: New York’s top court rejected the Kentucky Derby-winning thoroughbred trainer Rick Dutrow Jr.’s appeal to overturn his 10-year ban by state regulators because of what he claimed were substantial civil rights issues.
